challenges.name: Health Crisis
challenges.description: You have fallen sick and the dragons have the only cure! Hurry and reach them, as you grow weaker with every hit
challenges.author: Ruiner

challenges.name: Iron Blood
challenges.description: The slightest touch could kill you. The journey will be long, but your condition allows you to survive even the most deadliest of scenarios.
challenges.author: Ruiner

challenges.description: How many trophies can you collect?

challenges.description: You can no longer get any orbs
challenges.author: Ruiner

challenges.name: Purist
challenges.description: You only have what you start with. How far can you go?

challenges.name: Enraged Enemies
challenges.description: Enemies deal more damage the more you hit them.
